description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，开国少将。曾任军事调处执行部中共代表、北海舰队政治委员。
description.en: A general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army and a founding major general. He served as a CCP representative in the Military Mediation Executive Department and as the Political Commissar of the North Sea Fleet.

description.zh-cn: 中国江西省的一个县，是易耀彩的出生地。
description.en: A county in Jiangxi Province, China, the birthplace of Yi Yaocai.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the People's Republic of China.

en: Major General of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的军衔等级之一。
description.en: One of the military ranks of the Chinese People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 指1945年至1949年间，中国国民党与中国共产党之间发生的第二次武装冲突。
description.en: Refers to the second armed conflict between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China from 1945 to 1949.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战初期，由国民党、共产党和美国三方代表组成的军事调停机构。
description.en: A military mediation body composed of representatives from the Kuomintang, the Communist Party, and the United States during the early stages of the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中国河北省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Hebei Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，在北海舰队政治委员职务上由易耀彩接任。
description.en: A general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, succeeded by Yi Yaocai as the Political Commissar of the North Sea Fleet.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军三大舰队之一。
description.en: One of the three major fleets of the People's Liberation Army Navy.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，接替易耀彩担任北海舰队政治委员。
description.en: A general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, who succeeded Yi Yaocai as the Political Commissar of the North Sea Fleet.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国省级行政区。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 易耀彩是中国人民解放军的将领。
description.en: Yi Yaocai was a general in the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 1955年，易耀彩被授予中国人民解放军少将军衔。
description.en: In 1955, Yi Yaocai was awarded the military rank of Major General of the People's Liberation Army.

position.zh-cn: 第5执行小组驻张家口中共代表
position.en: CCP Representative of the 5th Executive Group in Zhangjiakou

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战初期，易耀彩担任军事调处执行部第5执行小组驻张家口中共代表。
description.en: During the early stages of the Second Chinese Civil War, Yi Yaocai served as the CCP Representative of the 5th Executive Group of the Military Mediation Executive Department in Zhangjiakou.

description.zh-cn: 易耀彩于1969年8月至1972年1月期间担任北海舰队政治委员。
description.en: Yi Yaocai served as the Political Commissar of the North Sea Fleet from August 1969 to January 1972.

description.zh-cn: 易耀彩接替卢仁灿担任北海舰队政治委员。
description.en: Yi Yaocai succeeded Lu Rencan as the Political Commissar of the North Sea Fleet.

description.zh-cn: 郭炳坤接任易耀彩的北海舰队政治委员职务。
description.en: Guo Bingkun succeeded Yi Yaocai as the Political Commissar of the North Sea Fleet.
